description: Add TimeEntryWorkItemContext type to @alga-psa/types scheduling interfaces
Create SchedulingContext with SchedulingCallbacks interface, useSchedulingCallbacks hook, and no-op default provider in @alga-psa/ui
Re-export SchedulingContext from packages/ui/src/context/index.ts
Create AgentScheduleView component in scheduling package with agentId prop
AgentScheduleView fetches events via getScheduleEntries for single agent with date range
AgentScheduleView renders week/day/month calendar using DynamicBigCalendar with view toggle
AgentScheduleView shows color-coded events by work item type via getEventColors
AgentScheduleView opens EntryPopup on event click for viewing/editing details
AgentScheduleView auto-scrolls to 8 AM working hours on mount
AgentScheduleView respects user_schedule:read / user_schedule:read:all permissions
AgentScheduleView renders CalendarStyleProvider and AgentScheduleDrawerStyles for calendar styling
Create timeEntryLauncher in scheduling package: orchestrates getCurrentTimePeriod, fetchOrCreateTimeSheet, builds IExtendedWorkItem, opens TimeEntryDialog via openDrawer
timeEntryLauncher shows toast error when no active time period exists
timeEntryLauncher opens TimeEntryDialog in inDrawer mode with correct work item, date, timePeriod, and timeSheetId
timeEntryLauncher onSave callback calls saveTimeEntry, closes drawer, and calls onComplete
Create MspSchedulingProvider in msp-composition that provides real renderAgentSchedule and launchTimeEntry callbacks via SchedulingCallbackProvider
Add @alga-psa/scheduling dependency to msp-composition package.json
Wrap ticket detail server page with MspSchedulingProvider
Wrap contact detail and activity server pages with MspSchedulingProvider
Wrap project detail server page with MspSchedulingProvider
Replace AgentScheduleDrawer stub with useSchedulingCallbacks().renderAgentSchedule
Replace TicketDetails handleAddTimeEntry stub with useSchedulingCallbacks().launchTimeEntry using ticket context
Replace InteractionDetails handleAddTimeEntry stub with useSchedulingCallbacks().launchTimeEntry using interaction context
Replace TaskForm handleAddTimeEntry stub with useSchedulingCallbacks().launchTimeEntry using task context
Graceful fallback: without MspSchedulingProvider, AgentScheduleDrawer shows alert and time entry shows toast
